abstract: I sometimes get Microsoft Word documents with a .docx file extension. What is this format, and is there a way to open them with Word 2003?

lead_paragraph: Q. I sometimes get Microsoft Word documents with a .docx file extension. What is this format, and is there a way to open them with Word 2003?

headline.main: Using the Old to Open the New

abstract: If Microsoft gets its way with its unsolicited bid $44.7 billion bid, will Yahoo end up like AOL, Time Warner‘s now-disgraced merger partner?
lead_paragraph: If Microsoft gets its way with its unsolicited bid $44.7 billion bid, will Yahoo end up like AOL, Time Warner‘s now-disgraced merger partner?

headline.main: Under Microsoft, Will Yahoo Become Another AOL?

abstract: It’s already clear it will take more than the usual rituals of corporate courtship to finalize a merger between Microsoft and Yahoo.

headline.main: A Bumpy Antitrust Road Ahead for Yahoo
